consoleAccess.description: Whether to enable access to the [ActiveMQ Web Console](http://activemq.apache.org/web-console.html) for the user. Applies to `engine_type` of `ActiveMQ` only.

groups.description: List of groups (20 maximum) to which the ActiveMQ user belongs. Applies to `engine_type` of `ActiveMQ` only.

password.description: Password of the user. It must be 12 to 250 characters long, at least 4 unique characters, and must not contain commas.

replicationUser.description: Whether to set set replication user. Defaults to `false`.

username.description:
Username of the user.

> **NOTE:** AWS currently does not support updating RabbitMQ users. Updates to users can only be in the RabbitMQ UI.
